summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting a deed to and easements over portions of the Enos Cooper Donation Claim No. 38, and Section 15, Township 22 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for the collection, treatment and transportation of contaminated runoff waters ("Leachate"); and for a leachate Sewer, Leachate Sewer Emergency overflow, Leachate collection system and appurtenances, toe stabilization buttress, right of ingress and egress and for sanitary sewer purposes. (Kent Highlands Leachate Interceptor)
